text: Benjamín Borasi (born 11 November 1997) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Sarmiento. ==Career== Borasi began in the youth set-up of El Huracán Rojas in 2004, where he remained until 2016 when he signed for Sarmiento. He made the move into senior football in March 2019, playing the full duration of a Copa Argentina defeat to Primera B Metropolitana's All Boys at the Estadio Julio Humberto Grondona on 27 March. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Sarmiento |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Primera B Nacional |0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!1!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rojas Partido Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Club Atlético Sarmiento footballers
